entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron appears around the side of the archway.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is demanding to know if anyone else can hear the whispering and murmuring.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna joins Ron and Harry around the side of the archway and hears people in the veil.

relationships.description: Harry's foot is on the dais, which is part of the archway.
Luna joins Ron and Harry around the side of the archway.
Hermione is trying to pull Harry away from Luna.
Luna can see people in the veil.
